short_summary: Cod Sentinel Survey for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), Science Branch in the Newfoundland-Labrador Region has a requirement for the delivery of a Cod Sentinel Survey. The three enterprises required are fixed gear (gill nets, lines trawls), inshore fishing boats operating in NAFO Division 3K; specifically, set locations require survey platforms (harvesters with appropriate gear) in Fogo, Seldom and Tilting.
full_summary:
# Sentinal Cod Survey - Fogo Island

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Reference Number**: WS3952467438-Doc3968861980
**Solicitation Number**: WS3952467438

**Project Overview**
-------------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is soliciting bids for the delivery of a Cod Sentinel Survey on Fogo Island, Newfoundland-Labrador Region.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

*   The contractor shall provide a fishery research or experimentation service
*   The service will involve the collection and distribution of fishery data
*   The contractor shall deploy fixed gear (gill nets, lines trawls), inshore fishing boats operating in NAFO Division 3K
*   Set locations require survey platforms (harvesters with appropriate gear) in Fogo, Seldom, and Tilting

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   **Contract Period**: Anticipated start date: 2023-05-01, anticipated end date: 2024-03-31
*   **Location**: Fogo Island, Newfoundland-Labrador Region
*   **Estimated Value**: Not specified

**Notice and Procurement Method**
---------------------------------

This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) under the Government of Canada's Trade Agreement (CFTA) and free trade agreements.

**Important Dates**
-------------------

*   **Publication Date**: 2023-04-19
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-04
*   **Amendment Date**: 2023-04-26
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-05-01

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

For more detailed information, please refer to the [full notice][link-to-notice]. You can also contact Janice Baird, Procurement Specialist at PSPC, at [janice.baird@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca][janice-baird-contact-info].

[link-to-notice]: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16043493?extsite=MTYwNDM0OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

[janice-baird-contact-info]: mailto:janice.baird@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
